modal.title: Characters Gallery
modal.description1: is the protagonist of our art gallery. A unique character that represents creativity and originality of contemporary art.
modal.description2: This collection presents different artistic interpretations of the character, showing the stylistic evolution and the various techniques used by the artist.

characteristics.color: Creative use of color and form

modal.finalNote: Each artwork tells a different story, always maintaining the essence of the character that inspired it.

ribelle.name: Ribelle il Pigro
ribelle.description: The protagonist of our art gallery. A unique character that represents creativity and originality of contemporary art.

giullare.name: The Jester
giullare.description: A fun and colorful character that brings joy to every artwork. With his playful spirit and exuberant nature, he represents the joy of art.

leon.name: Leon
leon.description: A strong and determined character with a unique style. Leon represents inner strength and determination through decisive and characteristic artistic traits.

polemico.name: The Controversial
polemico.description: A character who expresses strong opinions through art. With his provocative and reflective character, he challenges conventions and stimulates artistic debate.
